articles.author: MICHAEL R. SISAK
articles.title: Rory McIlroy calls out ‘unacceptable and abusive behavior’ from Bethpage fans at Ryder Cup - The Seattle Times
articles.description: Rory McIlroy helped Europe win the Ryder Cup and then called out the hostile New York crowd for “unacceptable and abusive behavior.”.
articles.content:
FARMINGDALE, N.Y. (AP) Rory McIlroy helped Europe win the Ryder Cup and then called out the hostile New York crowd for unacceptable and abusive behavior.

articles.author: Jessica Alvarado Gamez
articles.title: Starbucks closes at least 11 locations along Colorado’s Front Range - The Denver Post
articles.description: The Seattle-based coffee giant is closing hundreds of stores across the U.S., Canada and Europe.
articles.content:
Starbucks has closed at least 11 locations in metro Denver and Fort Collins after announcing plans last week to shutter hundreds of stores across the United States, Canada and Europe.
